content.en: Gaussian Process algorithms: Researchers have been investigating the role of algorithms in Gaussian Process regression models. These algorithms are used to define a distribution over functions and provide functionalities such as mean and covariance functions, likelihood functions, and various inference methods. The research aims to compare different algorithms based on their predictive accuracy, computational requirements, and suitability for model selection.
content.da: Gaussian Process-algoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt algoritmers rolle i Gaussian Process-regressionsmodeller. Disse algoritmer bruges til at definere en fordeling over funktioner og levere funktionaliteter som middel- og kovariansfunktioner, likelihood-funktioner og forskellige inferensmetoder. Forskningen sigter mod at sammenligne forskellige algoritmer baseret på deres prædiktive nøjagtighed, beregningsmæssige krav og egnethed til modelvalg.
